posts.title: Melted Snowman Ice Cubes
posts.content: Defrosty the snowman isn’t doing so well since summer rolled around. You kept his coal eyes and carrot nose protected all winter, but with the first warm day, you had to protect him in a cup. His carrot nose and dead black eyes now only serve the job of keeping your drink cold.

posts.title: Skull Egg Mold
posts.content: Give your meals a spooky touch using this skull egg mold. Simply place any peeled hard boiled egg into this food-safe plastic mold and it will magically transform it into an eerie skeleton’s face – making it perfect for Halloween themed snacks.

posts.title: Washable Draw-On Tablecloth
posts.content: Relive the glorious days of drawing awesome masterpieces with crayons while eating your food with these washable draw on tablecloths. Perfect for keeping the kids distracted, these draw on tablecloths use special markers to let you clean and re-use these tablecloths.

posts.title: Soylent Coffiest
posts.content: Enjoy a balanced breakfast while on-the-go by gulping down a bottle of Soylent Coffiest. It has the same caffeine levels as a regular cup of Joe, along with 400 extra calories of complete plant-based nutrition that’ll keep you fueled up and alert.

posts.title: Zombie Open Wound Prosthetic
posts.content: Create the illusion you’ve become infected with help from the zombie open wound prosthetic. Using this latex prosthetic and following the helpful make-up tips provided, you’ll be able to create some truly grotesque, horrific, and possibly contagious wounds.

posts.title: Jellyfish Paperweight
posts.content: Make your love of the sea known with a paperweight that has personality, stinging power, and glow-in-the-dark properties. The jellyfish paperweight will be the eye-catcher of your sea-themed office and will keep papers down when there’s a storm a-brewin.

posts.title: Dimensioning Instrument Pen
posts.content: Instantly and accurately capture the dimensions of any object using this dimensioning instrument pen. While one end features a trusty writing utensil, the other comes with a small rubberized roller which you move along the any surface to measure a desired distance.

posts.title: How To Be A Person In The World
posts.content: Learn to navigate the paradoxes of the modern world by reading How To Be A Person In The World. In this captivating read, advice columnist Heather Havrilesky shares her vast wisdom on various subjects to remind you that even in your darkest moments you’re not alone.

posts.title: Butt And Face Soap Bars
posts.content: Don’t risk cleaning your face with a nasty soap bar that has graced the nether regions of your fellow shower users – now with the butt and face soap bars you’ll always know you’re using the appropriate soap bar. Just watch out for trolls who will intentionally use them wrong.

posts.title: Quesadilla Grilling Basket
posts.content: Enjoy a savory culinary fiesta whenever the mood strikes by whipping yourself up a delicious snack using this quesadilla grilling basket. It encases your quesadilla in a compact cage so you can evenly cook it without making a mess.

posts.title: NES Cartridge Blow Me Poster
posts.content: The ‘Blow Me’ Poster will have you reminiscing of the days where games required a little pregame warm up before getting into the real fun stuff. The poster displays the classic NES Cartridge in all it’s 8-Bit glory in addition to a cheeky reference old school gamers will enjoy.

posts.title: Microwave Omelette Maker
posts.content: Make breakfast the tastiest meal of the day when you make the ultimate omelette using the microwave omelette maker. The specially designed plastic container allows you to make delicious and hearty omelettes in mere minutes for the ultimate healthy breakfast.
